translations: v.预测；预见；预言（forecast 的过去式和过去分词）

phrs.translation: 预测期，预报期；预测阶段

sentences.sentence: Policymakers who refocus efforts on improving well-being rather than simply worrying about GDP figures could avoid the forecasted doom and may even see progress.
sentences.translation: 如果政策制定者将注意力放在改善福祉上，而不是单纯担心 GDP 数据，就能避免预测中的厄运，甚至可能看到进展。

sentences.sentence: But policymakers who refocus efforts on improving well-being rather than simply worrying about GDP figures could avoid the forecasted doom and may even see progress.
sentences.translation: 但如果政策制定者将注意力放在改善福祉上，而不是单纯担心 GDP 数据，就能避免预测中的厄运，甚至可能看到进展。

sentences.sentence: Futurists and sci-fi visionaries have always forecasted big screens everywhere.
sentences.translation: 一直以来，在未来主义者和科幻梦想家的描绘中，未来处处皆有大屏幕。
